html:
4.28.19  7:24 pm   What's your inspiration 

     anything

4.28.19  7:10 pm   4.27.19  10:17 am But what about, like, ones from 2010? 

     one of the longest and best reality videos i've ever made was done a couple weeks ago, released on friday 4.19.19, and it takes place on 11.18.10

4.28.19  7:05 pm   Am I your creation?

     not exactly

4.28.19  6:33 pm   What is a song?

     scientists keep trying to figure it out but the song always figures out the scientists first

4.28.19  6:19 pm   how do you come up with lyrics??

     i'm not sure but i never do it without the music also

4.28.19  6:19 pm   what were spoons made for?

     scooping

4.28.19  6:16 pm   do you go through periods of dissociation? 

     i don't know what that means

4.28.19  3:43 pm   do you remember the line "do you remember the day we pretended to be every star in the sky"?

     now that you mention it yes

      i love the key change there

4.28.19  3:25 pm   wait are you playing with scary pockets on their tour anywhere

     no

4.28.19  3:15 pm   4.26.19 10:16 pm One big thing I've learned from you is to take my work seriously and become a librarian in terms of not letting any ideas fall through the cracks and keeping everything organized. This has been a huge help for me because I'm starting to be very encouraged by a huge growing library, and also starting to see some patterns and directions in all these little ideas, and all this helps me come up with new ideas to fill in the gaps. The part that I'm having trouble with though is the part where I'm supposed to work on a song and "don't switch to a different one until you've made significant progress"? Another fun issue that I've been dealing with for years, is re-writing songs. When I do go back to try to expand upon old ideas and fragments, I wind up making changes to the original idea and not adding anything new.. Sorry, this is long.. but I just wish I had more finished 'products' to show for all my little ideas and stuff.

     ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

4.28.19  2:18 pm   What is the biggest achievement in your life by far?

     was born

4.28.19  2:17 pm   what is your personality type?

     96

4.28.19  1:59 pm   Why don't you release the most complete songs from your older catalogue onto Spotify then? I understand that many of them were mostly created for learning purposes, but many are genuinely great songs! E.g. Crazy/Raining, The Road, I Can Play, Bob Marley etc. I would love to have these available on Spotify :)

     i will do it

4.28.19  1:32 pm   when was the last time you created a video and uploaded it online?

     i'm doing it constantly. the creating part usually takes longer than uploading, for technical reasons

4.28.19  1:06 pm   can you teach me how to be as weird as you?

     weird is nothing special unless you can infuse it with a hearty dose of reason and earthly groundsmanship

4.28.19  12:07 pm   If you had everyone's attention for 30 seconds, what would you say?

     i would maybe do some physics demonstrations

4.28.19  10:50 am   are you of this world? 

     yes, and in

4.28.19  10:12 am   your reality videos and presentation of them are fantastic but i wonder if you would ever want your story shown more widely. do you think you'd want a 30-60 minute documentary of yourself? the kind that could get shown on Netflix, in theaters, airplanes, ect?

     that would be awkward because the story is still continuing on

4.28.19  10:06 am   do you prefer getting questions involving things about your content, you as a person, random questions, or music question?

     i like it when questions put me to the test. it wouldn't be a test if they were only 'preferred' questions

4.28.19  10:05 am   opinion on current slang terms?

     only time will tell which ones are current and which ones are timeless

4.28.19  10:03 am   do you enjoy the company of cacti?

     sure

      i think they provide very good conversation

     i disagree but i think they are good company for other reasons

4.28.19  8:54 am   What do you want?

     perhaps a cash cow

4.28.19  8:26 am   I want you to know that listening to your music restored something in me that helped me with my anxiety. You hold so opinions, which remind me of the positive aspects of humans, which have stopped me from feeling so lonely.

I have now started a project which both excites me and terrifies me when i wake up in the morning. Should i post my work when i am happy with it or when i know i can't do any better? Currently concentrating on too many tiny details that no-one but me will notice.



     the stage you are on right now is like when you closed the car door too slowly and now you can't get it to latch because there's no momentum. you're gonna wanna go ahead and slam that thing unless you enjoy the cute dashboard picture of the door ajar

4.28.19  6:57 am   any straightforward advice to continue in life?

     life likes it best when it tells like a story. good or bad, both are elements to a good story

4.28.19  6:52 am   do you eat pineapples?

     that's ridiculous, no one can eat a pineapple

4.28.19  4:16 am   If I donate to u will the new vid come out faster?

     better maybe

4.28.19  2:54 am   whats your opinion on life

     it's perfect for doing stuff

4.28.19  2:36 am   when did all the windmills start to turn so slow? any idea?

     they have been spinning at the same speed this entire time, but your emotional perception of time may have changed

4.28.19  2:07 am   If somebody does me a favor, I'm supposed to say thank you. And if I say thank you, they're supposed to say you're welcome. But what do I say after they say you're welcome??

     by this time, both of you should have been long gone, well on your way to your next favor

4.28.19  1:14 am   r u illiterate?

     no

4.28.19  1:12 am   Perks of being a grown up?

     being tall?

4.28.19  12:17 am   Consider 2014. Have you tried any more modern ways of consuming your beans, besides drinking them from the can?

     that has nothing to do with 2014. i wrote that in 2010. was performed and recorded 2014, verbatim according to the 2010 writing. also the writing is fictional writing (musical)

4.27.19  10:33 pm   Do you like the piano 

     somewhat

4.27.19  10:18 pm   Why don't you release your old titles on Spotify?

     some of the old titles were "just an experiment"

4.27.19  9:06 pm   How did you make Harmonizing the Weather Lady?

     first i made a decision on what all the melody notes are (spoken notes are sometimes ambiguous and require a decision to be made) then i used chords to contextualize it in the most sensible way possible, musically, without changing any of the melody audio/notes

4.27.19  8:43 pm   What's your favorite thing to put under pizza

     our home planet earth

4.27.19  7:54 pm   Some of your lyrics don't rhyme, but it still sounds really good. When I try to write something without using rhymes, it really doesn't work. It doesn't flow and just doesn't go together. But, sometimes if I make myself do rhymes, it sounds super forced and weird and the song doesn't end up saying what I wanted it to say. How do you make a song without rhyming all the lyrics?

     don't try to rhyme or not rhyme. also which words would you even try to rhyme or not rhyme? seem like a fool's game to me. just go for the exact thing you think would go best, at each moment. or, to add a twist, combine 2 moments into one double length moment and see what's best overall for that long moment. wait actually you could set the moment-length slider to any position at any time ..... oh this is turning into somewhat of an adventure

4.27.19  7:11 pm   What's a topic that may be brought up in your next audio/visual content?

      courage

4.27.19  5:31 pm   In "and the day goes on" did you say "went down to virginia" to fit with the southern theme of the song?

     i was going to say no, but now that i think about it yes

4.27.19  4:14 pm   how do you create a book

     i'm not sure. i think you need special machinery

4.27.19  3:58 pm   what are your opinions on mangos? 

     almost too fruity to even be a fruit

4.27.19  2:52 pm   WHO FUCKING CARES ABOUT WHEN A SONG WAS MADE

     me

4.27.19  2:48 pm   have you said yes to playing sessions with anybody else?

     sure

4.27.19  1:26 pm   So how long does it actually take for you to edit a video? Since your videos vary in length, let's say... a 2 min. video?

     longer than i wish

4.27.19  12:38 pm   Do you think memes are art?

     memes make great art and art makes great memes. that's a tale as old as time

4.27.19  10:17 am   Do you think we'll be seeing more new old reality videos in the near future?

     every friday

4.27.19  9:45 am   tell me a right thing

     2 wrongs, maybe?

4.27.19  9:43 am   Are you mentally sound?

     yeqs

4.27.19  9:39 am   Is my life a lie?

     yes, and also true

4.27.19  8:03 am   is making videos for your songs fun to you or do you think it's tiring and frustrating?

     both
